mapper.sql: CodeType, CodeCode, CodeCname, ValidStatus, CreateTime, CreateUserCode, ModifyTime, ModifyUserCode, Reverse1, Reverse2, Reverse3
mapper.select:
select
from syscode where 1=1
and CodeType like '%${CodeType}%'
and CodeCode like '%${codeCode}%'
and codeCname like '%${codeCname}%'
mapper.insert: insert into syscode (CodeType, CodeCode, CodeCname, ValidStatus, CreateTime, CreateUserCode, ModifyTime, ModifyUserCode, Reverse1, Reverse2, Reverse3) values (#{CodeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeCname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reverse1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reverse2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reverse3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into syscode
CodeType,
CodeCode,
CodeCname,
ValidStatus,
CreateTime,
CreateUserCode,
ModifyTime,
ModifyUserCode,
Reverse1,
Reverse2,
Reverse3,
#{CodeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{codeCname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update syscode
CodeCname = #{codeCname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ValidStatus = #{validStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CreateTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CreateUserCode = #{createUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ModifyTime = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ModifyUserCode = #{modifyUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Reverse1 = #{reverse1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Reverse2 = #{reverse2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Reverse3 = #{reverse3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where CodeType = #{CodeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CodeCode = #{codeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from syscode sc where 1=1 and sc.CodeType = #{CodeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
